name: title
description: The name or title of the product

name: price
description: The price of the product, often including currency format

name: current_price
description: A variant of the price field, possibly reflecting discounts or changes

name: price_range
description: Price range for products that have variable pricing depending on variants or quantities

name: description
description: A detailed description of the product, highlighting its features and benefits

name: images
description: An array of image URLs showcasing the product

name: image
description: A singular or smaller set of image URLs for the product

name: image_gallery_images
description: Additional image URLs for showcasing the product's gallery

name: product_image
description: Main image for the product in the store

name: articlenumber
description: A unique identifier or SKU for the product

name: flavor
description: Description of the product's flavor profile

name: taste
description: Description of the taste profile of a product, often for foods or drinks

name: properties
description: Additional characteristics of the product, such as flavor, process, and variety

name: properties_overview
description: Overview of key properties or features of the product

name: aromas
description: List of aromas associated with the product, typically a beverage

name: geschmack
description: Flavors or taste description, typically in non-English products

name: geschmack (filter)
description: Taste profile for filter coffee variants

name: geschmack (espresso)
description: Taste profile for espresso coffee variants

name: process
description: Method used in processing or preparation of the product

name: variety
description: Type or species of the product, often used for agricultural products

name: herkunft
description: Place of origin of the product, typically for agricultural or specialty items

name: origin
description: The geographic origin from which the product is sourced

name: origin_description
description: Detailed description of the origin of the product

name: herkunft_beschreibung
description: Detailed description of the origin for non-English entries

name: harvest
description: The period during which the product was harvested, important for agricultural goods

name: importer
description: The company responsible for importing the product

name: importeur
description: The importer for non-English entries

name: tax_note
description: Information regarding tax inclusion and delivery charges

name: tax
description: Tax information regarding the product sale

name: additional_information
description: Additional relevant information about the product

name: detailed_description
description: Extended description providing in-depth details about the product

name: overview
description: A brief overview or summary of the product's features

name: recommendations
description: Suggested related products or pairings

name: features
description: Distinctive features and specifications of the product

name: information
description: General information or customer instructions regarding the product

name: content
description: Content or topics covered if the product is an educational or seminar service

name: region_origin
description: A detailed description specifically focusing on the regional origin of the product

name: certification
description: Details regarding any certifications the product has earned

name: product_name
description: The commercial name of the product

name: product_data
description: Key-value pairs representing the products primary data record

name: product_categories
description: Categories under which the product is listed, useful for filtering and searching

name: product_images
description: Set of image URLs, representing product showcase images

name: status
description: Current product availability status

name: weight
description: Weight of the product, when relevant, especially for packaged goods

name: unit_price
description: Price per unit measure, often used for bulk products or bundles

name: currency
description: Currency used for transaction

name: currency_format
description: Format in which the currency is displayed

name: shop_name
description: Name of the shop or brand selling the product

name: shop_url
description: URL of the shop
